about_the_game:
A collection of high-resolution artwork in printable quality. You can make posters out of them, hang them in your room or your studying or working space (we have them on the walls of our office!), and spend hours studying thousands of little details.

Our artist has put his heart and dozens of hours of work into this art, as did all of us, the developers. Buying this pack also serves as a token of your love and support to us!

Contents

  • 15+ Learning Factory posters, including Cat Guilds

  • 3 posters of great minds of data science: Ada Lovelace, Margaret Hamilton, and Alan Turing

  • Bonus poster: engineer's garage - how far can one go trying to please their cat? (Short answer: ridiculously far)

  • Image format: uncompressed .jpg, 8K

To find the downloaded art please click with the Right Mouse Button on Learning Factory in your Steam Library > Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files
